title: Student Management System
description: A desktop PyQt6 GUI app for managing university student data with an SQL database backend.

title: Visualizing Weather Forecast
description: A data web app that visualizes the weather forecast for the next five days of any city.

title: Job Search App
description: A Job Application Form where the seekers can fill their details and employer can check potential candidates from database

title: Todo App
description: A distraction-free web app to help you focus on creating and completing tasks.

title: Restaurant Menu Web App
description: A Django web app to let customers see a restaurant menu and meal availability.

title: Webcam Motion Detector
description: A program that monitors the computer webcam and sends an email when a new object enters the view.

title: Daily News Digest
description: A program that gets data from a news API and sends regular updates via your email

title: PDF Invoices
description: A script that reads invoice records from Excel files and automatically generates PDF invoices.

title: PDF Templates
description: A script that generates PDF templates of multiple pages given some predefined guidelines.
